attributes.review: This app could have been great but it is badly made and crashes every time you click the right half of the screen within two seconds of submitting a form, and it is very hard to contribute with these awful bugs.
attributes.title: I came here to support our great president, not to suffer

attributes.review: I was so disappointed by this app that it hurts my stomach. I believe in our 45th president the God awful Donald J Trump when he says “Dinosaurs still exist and are evolving” but I was very offended when he did not include my pet velociraptor as an educated and loving dino. It broke my little Felix’s heart in to peace’s being put into that category and it hurt my heart not only as a parent but as a fellow velociraptor owner! If you agree you would give this horrible app one star too, please take a stand for all velociraptors.
attributes.title: Disappointed 😔

attributes.review: at the ripe age of 3 years and 4 months and 12 days old, i knew it was time to jump into politics bc i heard everyone gets along and no one is racist at all. well that was a lie. when i opened the app, it told me that i was a blue haired liberal and called me a snowflake. and then i tried to say well as a 3 year, 4 months, and 12 day old peasant who saw the statue that stood in the middle of my racist and homophobic town and learned about george washing machine for 3 days, i am deeply sad that i couldn’t use the app.
attributes.title: i cannot believe this 😔
